// HUD
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
    vs_3_0
def c222, 0, 1, 0.0625, 2
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_color v1
    dcl_texcoord v2
    dcl_position o0
    dcl_color o1
    dcl_texcoord o2
dcl_2d s0
//    mov o0, v0
    mov r30, v0
    mov o1, v1
    mov o2, v2

texldl r31, c222.z, s0 // r31.x = separation

mov r25.x, c251.x
if_eq r25.x, c222.y
	// Matched lens flare texture, move to infinity
	add r30.x, r30.x, r31.x
else
	mad r30.x, r31.x, c224.x, r30.x // X = X + separation * Const1
endif
mov o0, r30

// approximately 3 instruction slots used
